binaryType.title: Binary
binaryType.description: A set of (in)finite-length sequences of binary digits

booleanType.title: Boolean
booleanType.description: A binary variable, having two possible values called “true” and “false”.

decimalType.title: Decimal
decimalType.description: A subset of the real numbers, which can be represented by decimal numerals

integerType.title: Integer
integerType.description: An integer is a whole number (not a fraction) that can be positive, negative, or zero.

dateType.title: Date
dateType.description: Time point representing a calendar day on a time scale consisting of an origin and a succession of calendar [ISO 8601:2004]

amountType.title: Amount. Type
amountType.description: A number of monetary units specified in a currency where the unit of the currency is explicit or implied.

x-ccts_metadata.definition: A number of monetary units specified in a currency where the unit of the currency is explicit or implied.

binaryObjectType.title: Binary Object. Type
binaryObjectType.description: A set of finite-length sequences of binary octets.

x-ccts_metadata.definition: A set of finite-length sequences of binary octets.

codeType.title: Code. Type
codeType.description: A character string (letters, figures or symbols) that for brevity and/or language independence may be used to represent or replace a definitive value or text of an Attribute together with relevant supplementary information.

x-ccts_metadata.definition: A character string (letters, figures or symbols) that for brevity and/or language independence may be used to represent or replace a definitive value or text of an Attribute together with relevant supplementary information.

dateTimeType.title: Date Time. Type
dateTimeType.description: A particular point in the progression of time together with the relevant supplementary information.

x-ccts_metadata.definition: A particular point in the progression of time together with the relevant supplementary information.

dateType.title: Date. Type
dateType.description: A particular point in the progression of time together with the relevant supplementary information.

x-ccts_metadata.definition: A particular point in the progression of time together with the relevant supplementary information.

graphicType.title: Graphic. Type
graphicType.description: A set of finite-length sequences of binary octets.

x-ccts_metadata.definition: A set of finite-length sequences of binary octets.

idType.title: Identifier. Type
idType.description: A character string to identify and distinguish uniquely, one instance of an object in an identification scheme from all other objects in the same scheme together with relevant supplementary information.

x-ccts_metadata.definition: A character string to identify and distinguish uniquely, one instance of an object in an identification scheme from all other objects in the same scheme together with relevant supplementary information.

indicatorType.title: Indicator. Type
indicatorType.description: A list of two mutually exclusive Boolean values that express the only possible states of a Property.

x-ccts_metadata.definition: A list of two mutually exclusive Boolean values that express the only possible states of a Property.

measureType.title: Measure. Type
measureType.description: A numeric valuedetermined by measuring an object along with the specified unit of measure.

x-ccts_metadata.definition: A numeric valuedetermined by measuring an object along with the specified unit of measure.

nameType.title: Name. Type
nameType.description: A character string (i.e. a finite set of characters) generally in the form of words of a language.

x-ccts_metadata.definition: A character string (i.e. a finite set of characters) generally in the form of words of a language.

numericType.title: Numeric. Type
numericType.desactiption: Numeric information that is assigned or is determined by calculation, counting, or sequencing. It does not require a unit of quantity or unit of measure.

x-ccts_metadata.definition: Numeric information that is assigned or is determined by calculation, counting, or sequencing. It does not require a unit of quantity or unit of measure.

percentType.title: Percent. Type
percentType.description: Numeric information that is assigned or is determined by calculation, counting, or sequencing. It does not require a unit of quantity or unit of measure.

x-ccts_metadata.definition: Numeric information that is assigned or is determined by calculation, counting, or sequencing. It does not require a unit of quantity or unit of measure.

pictureType.title: Picture. Type
pictureType.descriptionion: A set of finite-length sequences of binary octets.

x-ccts_metadata.definition: A set of finite-length sequences of binary octets.

quantityType.title: Quantity. Type
quantityType.description: A counted number of non-monetary units possibly including fractions.

x-ccts_metadata.definition: A counted number of non-monetary units possibly including fractions.

rateType.title: Rate. Type
rateType.description: Numeric information that is assigned or is determined by calculation, counting, or sequencing. It does not require a unit of quantity or unit of measure.

x-ccts_metadata.definition: Numeric information that is assigned or is determined by calculation, counting, or sequencing. It does not require a unit of quantity or unit of measure.

soundType.title: Sound. Type
soundType.description: A set of finite-length sequences of binary octets.

x-ccts_metadata.definition: A set of finite-length sequences of binary octets.

textType.title: Text. Type
textType.description: A character string (i.e. a finite set of characters) generally in the form of words of a language.

x-ccts_metadata.definition: A character string (i.e. a finite set of characters) generally in the form of words of a language.

timeType.title: Time. Type
timeType.desctiption: A particular point in the progression of time together with the relevant supplementary information.

x-ccts_metadata.definition: A particular point in the progression of time together with the relevant supplementary information.

valueType.title: Value. Type
valueType.description: Numeric information that is assigned or is determined by calculation, counting, or sequencing. It does not require a unit of quantity or unit of measure.

x-ccts_metadata.definition: Numeric information that is assigned or is determined by calculation, counting, or sequencing. It does not require a unit of quantity or unit of measure.

videoType.title: Video. Type
videoType.description: A set of finite-length sequences of binary octets.

x-ccts_metadata.definition: A set of finite-length sequences of binary octets.
